description:
PanoCalc calculates the camera angles required to take stunning 360 degree panoramas. The app comes preconfigured with the specs of the camera in your phone, but you can fill out information for any other camera. Note: this app does not shoot panoramas, just calculates the number pictures for a given camera and lens.
Supported features:
* calculates panoramas for the camera in your phone, or for any SLR, DSLR or point & shoot
* Portrait or landscape orientation
* Single or multi-row panoramas
* Normal and fisheye lenses
* Presets for many sensor sizes and focal lengths, or enter your own custom settings
* Configurable overlaps
* Suggests the use of zenith and nadir pictures when necessary
* Top and side view diagrams
* Optional explanations for all the items
